tr.td:
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

td.p: An illustration of the gradient descent method. I graphed this with Matlab

tr.td: This file was derived from Gradient descent.png:

ul.li: Gradient_descent.png: The original uploader was Olegalexandrov at English Wikipedia

table.style: margin: 0.5em auto; width: 100%; background-color: #f8f8f8; border: 2px solid #e0e0e0; padding: 5px; direction: ltr;

td.span: This is a retouched picture, which means that it has been digitally altered from its original version. Modifications: Vector version. The original can be viewed here: Gradient descent.png. Modifications made by Zerodamage.

table.style: clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f0f0f0; border:2px solid #e0e0e0; direction: ltr;
